rukus.text: 50|30|eoneunal hananimkkeseo man-won-ingalago jiog-e mul-euni ajig deohayeo eul jaga issnaikka lago malhadeola
50|31|geuleona uiloun jadeul-egeneun chingug-i meolji ani haess-euni
50|32|igeos-eun chamhoehayeo hananimkke gwiuihago geubun-ui yulbeob-eul junsuhaneun-uiloun jadeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-imyeo
50|33|boiji anihamyeo jaaelousinhananim-eul dulyeowo hamyeo geubunkke heon sinhaneun jadeul-eul wihan geos-ini
50|34|pyeon-anhi geuligo anjeonhage geu gos-e deul-eogala igeos-i yeongsaeng-ui nal ila
50|35|geugos-eneun geudeul-i wonhaneun mo deun geos-i iss-eumyeo hananim gyeot-eneun deomanh-eun geos-i issnola

50|36|hananim-eun geudeul ijeon geudeul boda ganghayeossdeon sedaedeul-eul geudeul-ui joe ag-eulo malmiam-a eolmana manh-i myeol mangke hayeossneunyo geuttae geudeul-eun jisang eul banghwanghayeoss-euna geudeul-i pihal gos i iss-eossdeonyo
50|37|sillo i an-eneun ma-eum-eul ga jinjawa gwileul giul-in jawa geuligo jinsildoege gwanchalhaneun jaleul wihan gyo hun-i issnola
50|38|hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu deul saiui modeun geos-eul yug-ilgan-e changjohasim-e jogeumdo pigonhaji anihaessnola
50|39|geuleomeulo geudeul-i malhaneun geos e geudaeneun innaehala geuligo haega tteugijeon-e geuligo haega jigijeon-e geudae junim-eul chan-yanghala
50|40|bamjung-edo geuligo yebaeleul deu lin huedo hananim-eul chan-yanghala
50|41|geuligo meolji anhneun gos-eulo buteo iss-eul cheonsaui buleum-e gwileul gi ul-ila
50|42|geudeul-i jinliui solileul deudge doel geunal-i balo buhwal-ui nal-i doe lila
50|43|hananim-i saengmyeong-eul jusa saengmyeong eul as-agani choehuui mogjeogjineun geu bun-isila
50|44|daejiga gallajineun nal geudeul-eun seodulleo nawa dahamkke moinani geugeos-i hananimkke swiun geos-ila

50|45|hananim-eun geudeul-i malhaneun modeun geos-eul algo issnani geudaeneun geudeul-ege gang-yohaneun ja anila geuleo meulo hananim-ui gyeong-goleul dulyeowo ha neun jadeul-ege i kkulan-eul nangsonghala
